comprehensive_overview: SMRT Link is a software suite designed for the analysis of Single-Molecule Real-Time (SMRT) sequencing data obtained from PacBio sequencers. It serves as a central hub for data processing, analysis, visualization, and storage in bioinformatics applications.
core_features: Centralized platform for PacBio sequencing data analysis
Data processing and quality control tools
Support for long-read sequencing data analysis
